드디어 원고도 올라왔고, 붕괴양도 천천히 쉬게 해줘야겠죠~.우후후~, 자신에게 작은 휴일을 선물하고 날개를 펴야죠~.

msg
在绝望的世界之中，大家既有过悲伤，也有过快乐，有着失败的绝望，也有战胜强敌的热血……吃着糖与玻璃渣一同等待着最后的希望。
絶望した世界の中で、皆が悲しみを抱え、喜びを抱え、過ちの絶望を抱え、#n強敵に勝つ情熱を抱えている……飴とガラスの破片を同時に口に含みながら、最後の希望を待っている。
절망한 세계 속에서 모두가 슬픔을 품고, 기쁨을 품고, 과오의 절망을 품고,#n강적을 이기는 열정을 품고...... 사탕과 유리 조각을 동시에 입에 머금은 채 마지막 희망을 기다리고 있습니다.

In the midst of a desperate world, we have both sorrow and happiness, the despair of defeat and the fervor of victory over a strong enemy....... Eating sugar and glass slag together waiting for the last hope.

In a world of despair, everyone has sorrow, joy, the despair of mistakes, and the passion to win over a strong enemy...... candy and shards of glass in their mouths at the same time, waiting for the last hope.
msg
逐火之蛾虽然已经完结，九霄的旅行也已经结束，但是累得不行的灵依娘却还有很长的路要走……
“火を追う蛾”は完結し、九霄の旅も終わりましたけど、#n疲れ果てた崩壊娘は、まだまだ長い道のりを歩まなければなりません……。
“불을 좇는 나방”은 완결되었고, 큐쇼의 여정도 끝이 났지만,#n지친 붕괴娘은 아직도 먼 길을 걸어야 합니다......
Although the Moth by Fire is over and the trip to Kyuushou is over, the exhausted Ling Yiniang still has a long way to go ......
"Moths Chasing Fire" is complete and Kyuushou's journey is over, but the exhausted Honkai still has a long way to go. ......

There's one more piece of additional content for you to add!

That's right. Following Moths Chasing Fire, the new and improved resource content has been added to the schedule!

崩壊娘が絶望の中で、いかにして長編大作を書き上げていくかが綴られます！#nそして、締切日に追われる崩壊娘——ッ！
붕괴소녀가 절망 속에서 어떻게 장편 대작을 완성해 나가는지가 담겨집니다! 그리고, 마감일에 쫓기는 붕괴소녀!
That's the full-length story about how Reiyi Niang rushes her manuscript in desperation! Chasing the deadline for Reiyi Niang!
The story tells how Honkai's daughter, in desperation, writes a full-length epic! And Honkai's daughter is being chased by a deadline...!

才怪！
って、そんなわけありません！！
라고, 그런 일은 있을 수 없어!!
That's weird!
And that's not true!

それではまた、再び会える時を楽しみにしていますね～！
그럼 다시 만날 때를 기대하며!
Then ~ look forward to the moment when we meet again!
So I look forward to seeing you again!

那是如同命运般相互吸引的二人，

Those two, who are attracted to each other like destiny.
They were drawn to each other as if by fate.

その遥か彼方の記憶が、再び火を灯されようとしている……。
저 머나먼 기억이 다시 불꽃을 피우려 하고 있다…….
That distant memory will be rekindled ......
That far-off memory is about to be lit again. ......

Honkai Gakuen New Material Contents--

あなたと共に、「ゼロ」から始める。
당신과 함께, 「제로」에서 시작한다.

Starting from "zero" with you.
992: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
They know that Himeko would make an end to Herrscher when she woke up, Emesa and Kyuushou decided to go with him.
清楚姬子醒来后会与律者做个了断埃米沙和九霄，决意要随其一同前行。
律者と最後の決着をつけようとする姫子。それを知ったエミザと九霄は、共に学園都市へと向かうことを決心する。一方、ハイペリオンに残ったイザーリンは、基地で皆の不安を払拭させることに専念していた。
율자와의 최후의 결판을 내려는 히메코. 이를 알게 된 에미자와 큐쇼는 함께 학원 도시로 향하기로 결심한다. 한편, 히페리온에 남은 이자린은 기지에서 모두의 불안을 해소하는 데 전념하고 있었다.
Knowing full well that Himeko will make a deal with the Herrscher when he wakes up Emesa and Kyuushou, are determined to accompany him on his journey.

Himeko tries to make a final settlement with Herrscher. Emesa and Kyuushou learn of this and decide to head for the school city together. Meanwhile, Estherine, who remained in Hyperion, concentrates on dispelling everyone's fears at the base.
msg
They met Theresa who was fighting to Bronya outside the base.
随后，趁着伊瑟琳在基地稳定局势之时，姬子三人在外碰见了与布洛妮娅战斗的德丽莎。
崩壊生物との戦いを繰り広げながら、学園都市を進む姫子一行。その道中、ブローニャと対峙するテレサに遭遇する。
붕괴 생물과의 싸움을 벌이면서 학원 도시를 나아가는 히메코 일행. 그 도중 브로냐와 대치하는 테레사를 마주하게 된다.
Then, while Estherine was stabilizing the situation at the base, the three Himeko's ran into Theresa, who was fighting Bronya, outside.
Himeko's group proceeds through the school city, battling with Honkai creatures. Along the way, they encounter Theresa, who confronts Bronya.
msg
The team followed Theresa and found Seele who was dying. But they didn't know that Herrscher was also coming.
之后，众人跟随德丽莎与奄奄一息的希儿再会，但律者却也随即袭来。
争いをやめない二人の間へ仲裁に入る姫子。双方の手を止めさせると、テレサから衝撃の事実を告げられるのであった——ゼーレは生きていると。そして、一行は虫の息となったゼーレと再会を果たすこととなる。
싸움을 멈추지 않는 두 사람 사이에 중재로 나서는 히메코. 양측의 손을 멈추게 한 후 테레사에게서 충격적인 사실을 전해 듣게 된다——제레가 살아있다는 것. 그리고 일행은 간신히 목숨을 부지한 제레와 재회를 이루게 된다.
Afterward, the crowd follows Theresa as she rejoins the dying Seele, but the Lawgiver strikes immediately afterward.
Himeko intervenes between the two who will not stop fighting. When she gets both sides to stop, Theresa tells them a shocking truth: Seele is alive. The group is then reunited with the dead Seele.
msg
In order to covering others, Himeko fought with the Herrscher and gone…
结果，为了让众人安全逃脱，姬子舍身抵挡律者，也因此永远地离开了大家……
そんなゼーレを見た姫子たちは、崩壊エネルギーが充満する学園都市からゼーレを連れ出し、長空市へと戻ることにする。しかし、そこを律者に襲われてしまうのであった。
그런 제레를 본 히메코 일행은 붕괴 에너지가 가득한 학원 도시에서 제레를 데리고 장공시로 돌아가기로 한다. 그러나 그곳에서 율자의 습격을 받고 만다.
As a result, in order to allow the crowd to escape safely, Himeko gave up her life to fend off the Herrscher, and as a result, she left everyone forever ......
Seeing Seele, Himeko and her colleagues decided to take him out of the Honkai energy-filled school city and return to Nagora City. However, they were attacked by Herrscher.
msg
Hope everyone can live out the rest of her life in peace. Theresa also stopped Bronya to avenge.
希望大家能平静度过余生的德丽莎，也在布洛妮娅想对律者复仇时奋力阻挡。
皆が律者から無事に逃げられるよう囮を買って出る姫子。だが、無情にもその命は刈り取られてしまう……。一行はテレサのセーフハウスへと逃げ延びるも、そこで再びテレサとブローニャがぶつかり合う。
모두가 율자에게서 무사히 빠져나올 수 있도록 미끼를 자청하는 히메코. 하지만 무참히 그 생명은 앗겨나고 말았다……. 일행은 테레사의 세이프하우스로 도망치지만, 그곳에서 다시 테레사와 브로냐가 충돌한다.
Theresa, who wants everyone to live out the rest of their lives in peace, also fights to stop Bronya when she tries to take revenge on Herrscher.

Himeko takes the bait so that everyone can escape safely from Herrscher. However, their lives are mercilessly reaped. ...... The group escapes to Theresa's safe house, where Theresa and Bronya clash again.
msg
However, the attack of Herrscher will not stop. At the same time, it was also showed that Kyuushou was controled by Houkai.
然而，律者的袭击不会停止，九霄也在同时表现出了似被崩坏控制的异样，却因此制止了律者进攻。
テレサの懸命な説得により、ブローニャは復讐よりも生きることを選択する。だが、律者からの攻撃は止むことなく続く。その時、崩壊に支配された九霄が律者の攻撃を防ぐのであった。
테레사의 간절한 설득으로 브로냐는 복수보다 삶을 선택한다. 하지만 율자의 공격은 멈추지 않는다. 그때, 붕괴에 지배당한 큐쇼가 율자의 공격을 막아선다.
However, the Herrscher's attacks would not stop, and Kyuushou was also showing a dissimilarity that seemed to be controlled by Honkai at the same time, but thus stopped the Herrscher from attacking.

With Theresa's hard persuasion, Bronya chooses to live rather than take revenge. But the attacks from Herrscher continue unabated. At that moment, Kyuushou, ruled by Honkai, prevents Herrscher's attack.
msg
Finally, at the end of the battle, Kiana left with Mei and raised a tower above the earth that symbolized the end.
最后，在战斗的尾声琪亚娜协同芽衣一同离去，而在大地之上也升起了象征终末的高塔。
苛烈な戦いを終えた末、キアナと芽衣はその場を去っていく。そして、大地には終焉を象徴する巨大な塔が出現する。
치열한 전투 끝에 키아나와 메이는 그 자리를 떠난다. 그리고 대지에는 종언을 상징하는 거대한 탑이 모습을 드러낸다.
Finally, at the end of the battle, Kiana departs with Mei, and a tower symbolizing the end rises above the earth.
After a grueling battle, Kiana and Mei leave the scene. Then, a huge tower symbolizing the end of the world appears on the earth.
msg
The long dead spot was shining again, the countdown to the end... will also begin.
暗淡已久的死斑再度亮起，末日的倒计时……终将开始。
漆黒の死斑が再び輝き出した今、終焉へのカウントダウンが動き始めるのであった——
칠흑의 사반이 다시 빛을 발하기 시작한 지금, 종언을 향한 카운트다운이 움직이기 시작한다——
The long-darkened dead spot lights up again, and the countdown to doomsday ...... will finally begin.
Now that the jet-black dead spots were shining again, the countdown to the end began to move.
993: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
Under the attack of Herrscher, "Moths in Fire"  managed to escape in Hyperion.
在律者的攻击之下，逐火之蛾部队勉强乘坐休伯利安逃脱。
律者の攻撃を受けた火を追う蛾は、ハイペリオンに乗り基地から脱出することを選ぶ。
율자의 공격을 받은 불을 쫓는 나방은 히페리온을 타고 기지에서 탈출하기로 선택한다.
Under the attack of the Herrscher, the Moth by Fire forces barely escaped in Hyperion.
The moth chasing the fire under attack by Herrscher chooses to escape from the base in a Hyperion.
msg
Bronya killed all Houkai Creatures and left the troop.
失去希儿的布洛妮娅，在愤怒下灭杀了入侵的崩坏生物，独自离开了部队。
しかし、その脱出はゼーレという大きな代償を支払うこととなってしまった。そのことに怒り狂ったブローニャは侵入した崩壊生物を壊滅させ、律者に挑むためひとり部隊から去ることを決意する。
하지만 그 탈출은 제레라는 거대한 대가를 치르게 되었다. 이에 분노에 찬 브로냐는 침입한 붕괴 생물을 섬멸하고 율자에게 도전하기 위해 부대를 홀로 떠나기로 결심한다.
Bronya, who lost Seele, exterminated the invading Honkai creatures in a fit of rage and left the unit alone.
However, the escape came at a heavy price: Seele. Angered by this, Bronya decides to leave the unit alone to destroy the infested Honkai and challenge Herrscher.
msg
And then Himeko became the captain and led the search for the items to repair Hyperion.
之后，姬子接下队长一职，带领大家寻找修理休伯利安的零件。
ブローニャがいなくなった火を追う蛾は、姫子を隊長とし動き始める。そして、ハイペリオンを修理するため、パーツの調達任務を遂行する。
브로냐가 사라진 불을 쫓는 나방은 히메코를 대장으로 삼아 움직이기 시작한다. 히페리온 수리를 위해 부품 조달 임무를 수행하게 된다.
Afterwards, Himeko takes over as captain and leads the search for parts to repair Hyperion.
The moth chasing the fire with Bronya gone begins to move, with Himeko as its captain. They then go on a mission to procure parts to repair Hyperion.
msg
However, hope did not come true. The Houkai creatures struck again, and the dying people burned up the last life of Hyperion.
然而，希望没有降临，崩坏生物再度来袭，奄奄一息的众人，燃尽了休伯利安引擎最后的寿命。
だが、それでも火を追う蛾に希望が訪れることはなかった。再び崩壊生物の襲撃にさらされてしまうハイペリオン。隊員たちの息は絶え絶えとなり、ハイペリオンのエンジン寿命もついには燃え尽きてしまう。
그러나 여전히 불을 쫓는 나방에게 희망은 찾아오지 않았다. 다시 붕괴 생물의 습격을 받은 히페리온. 대원들의 생명이 위태로워지고, 히페리온의 엔진도 결국 한계에 도달해 작동을 멈춘다.
However, hope did not come, the Honkai creatures struck again, and the dying multitude burned out the last of the Hyperion's engine's lifespan.
But still, hope did not come to the fire-chasing moth. Hyperion is once again attacked by the Honkai creatures. The crew members are out of breath, and Hyperion's engine life finally burns out.
msg
Fleeing back to ME, they fight to the death to defeat the powerful creature Kukulkan. But the Herrscher entered the battle.
终于，逃回ME社的她们，拼死打败了威胁她们的崩坏生物库库尔坎，然而，律者却降临在她们面前。
命からがらME社に逃げ戻った彼女たちは、脅威であった崩壊生物「ククルカン」の討伐を決死の思いで果たす。そんな彼女たちの前に二人の律者が姿を現した。
목숨을 부지해 ME사로 귀환한 그들은 위협적 존재였던 붕괴 생물「쿠쿨칸」을 처단하기 위해 필사적으로 싸운다. 그러던 그들 앞에 두 명의 율자가 모습을 드러냈다.
Finally, escaping back to the M.E. Corporation, the girls fight to the death to defeat Kukulkan, the Honkai creature that threatened them, however, the Herrscher descends upon them.
After fleeing for their lives, the girls returned to M.E. Corporation and were determined to defeat Kukulkan, a threatening Honkai creature. Two Herrschers appeared before them.
msg
Finally, the Herrscher left ME with an invitation to the place of origin. Himeko lost consciousness because of erosion, .....
最后，律者留下起始之地的邀请，离开了ME社，而姬子……也因为崩坏侵蚀，失去了意识……
律者は、始まりの地へと彼女たちを誘う言葉を残すとME社から姿を消してしまう。その直後、姫子が崩壊の侵蝕により意識を失ってしまうのであった……。
율자는 시작의 땅으로 초대하는 말을 남기고 ME사에서 사라진다. 직후 히메코가 붕괴의 침식으로 의식을 잃어버리는 사태가 발생하는데……
In the end, the Herrscher left the invitation to the Beginning Land and left the M.E. Corporation, and Himeko ...... lost her consciousness due to the Honkai erosion ......
Herrscher leaves words inviting the girls to the place of beginnings and disappears from M.E. Corporation. Shortly thereafter, Himeko loses consciousness due to the erosion of Honkai. ......
994: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
They were attacked by many mekas during the operation at ME Corp.
在ME社攻略作战中，她们遭到了大批机甲的攻击。
ME社攻略戦の途中、彼女たちは大量の機甲の攻撃に遭遇した。
ME사 공략전 도중, 그녀들은 대량의 기갑 공격에 직면했다.
During the M.E. Corporation Raider battle, they were attacked by a large number of mechs.
During the course of the M.E. Corporation campaign, the girls encountered a large number of armored attacks.
msg
After Bronya hacked the ME Corp database, they had finally held off the attack of mekas and captured ME Corp.
之后，依靠着布洛妮娅骇入ME社数据库，她们终于防住机甲攻势拿下ME社。
その後、ブローニャの力によりデータベースに侵入し、彼女たちは機甲の攻勢を防ぎきりME社を攻略する。
그 후, 브로냐의 힘으로 데이터베이스에 침입해, 그녀들은 기갑의 공세를 막아내고 ME사를 공략한다.
After that, relying on Bronya hacking into the M.E. Corporation's database, they finally defended against a mecha attack to take down the M.E. Corporation.
Then, with Bronya's help, the girls penetrate the database, and they are able to prevent the armored offensive and capture M.E. Corporation.
msg
However, Herrscher Mei appeared in front of everyone and started to attack them together with the mekas.
此时，律者芽衣却出现在了众人面前，并联合着机甲对她们发起了攻击。
しかし、攻略と同時に律者芽衣が皆の前に現れる。芽衣は機甲すらも巻き込み、彼女たちを攻撃した。
그러나 공략과 동시에 율자메이가 모두 앞에 나타난다. 메이는 기갑마저 휘말리게 하며 그들을 공격했다.
At that moment, Herrscher Mei appeared in front of the group and united the mechs to attack them.
However, Herrscher Mei appears before everyone at the same time as the attack. Mei attacked them, engulfing even the armored ones.
msg
After they fled, they had no choice but to give up the base and use Hyperion to get away.
而从劫难中逃脱的众人，只能开始准备舍弃基地利用休伯利安号逃跑的计划。
辛くも難を逃れた人々は基地を捨て、ハイペリオン号で逃げるしかなかった。
간신히 난을 피한 사람들은 기지를 버리고 히페리온호로 도망칠 수밖에 없었다.
And the crowd that escaped from the hijacking could only begin to prepare a plan to abandon the base and use the Hyperion to escape.
Those who narrowly escaped had no choice but to abandon their base and flee on the Hyperion.
msg
During this operation, in order to make Bronya leave safely, Seele didn’t manage to board to ship.
在逃脱行动期间，希儿为了让布洛妮娅安全离开，使得自己没能成功登舰。
その撤退行動の際、ゼーレはブローニャが安全に逃げられるよう、自ら戦艦に乗らないことを決意。
그 철수 작전 도중 제레는 브로냐가 안전하게 도망칠 수 있도록 스스로 전함에 타지 않기로 결심했다.
During the escape operation, Seele made herself unsuccessful in boarding the ship in order to get Bronya out safely.
During that retreat, Seele decided not to board the battleship himself so that Bronya could escape to safety.
msg
So she was lost in the devastating attack of the Herrscher...
于是，她便在律者毁灭性的攻击之中，失去了踪影……
そして、彼女は律者の放つ輝きの中、姿を消していくのであった……。
그리고 그녀는 율자가 내뿜는 빛 속에서 모습을 감추고 말았다……
She was then lost in the midst of the Herrscher's devastating attack ......
And then she disappeared in the radiance of Herrscher's radiance. ......
995: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
The world has been destroyed by Herrscher Kiana. However, humans have not yet given up hope.
在世界被律者琪亚娜毁灭之后，人类并未放弃希望。
世界は律者・キアナによって終焉を迎える。荒廃した大地と崩れ落ちるビル群……しかし、そんな絶望たる光景の中、人類は希望を捨てていなかった。
세계는 율자・키아나에 의해 종언을 맞이한다. 황폐해진 대지와 무너져 내리는 빌딩 군락...... 그러나 그러한 절망적인 광경 속에서도 인류는 희망을 버리지 않았다.
After the world was destroyed by Kiana the Herrscher, humanity did not give up hope.
The world comes to an end by Herrscher, Kiana. The devastated land and crumbling buildings ...... However, in the midst of such a hopeless scene, humanity has not given up hope.
msg
The resistance force "Moth into Flame" is thereby created, recruiting survivors who are still willing to continue fighting against their fate. Thus begin the never-ending battles...
于是，反抗组织“逐火之蛾”被建立起来，找寻着还想继续反抗的、战斗的幸存者。之后便开始了漫长的斗争……
崩壊に抗い、生きるため、僅かに残された生存者たちが集い、レジスタンス組織「火を追う蛾」を結成する。これにより長い戦いの火蓋が再び切られることとなった……。
붕괴에 항거하며 살아가기 위해, 간신히 남은 생존자들이 모여 레지스탕스 조직 「불을 좇는 나방」을 결성한다. 이를 통해 긴 전투의 화약이 다시 점화되게 되었다.......
Thus, the resistance organization "Moth by Fire" was established to find survivors who wanted to continue the resistance and fight. After that, a long struggle began. ......
In order to survive and resist Honkai, the few remaining survivors gather together to form the resistance organization "Moths Chasing Fire". This marks the beginning of another long battle. ......
msg
In the fifth year after the wars have begun, a new survivor turns up in the base.
战斗进行到第五年的时候，基地中迎来了一名新的幸存者。
そして、レジスタンス結成から5年の月日が流れる。レジスタンスの基地へ彼女が——新たな生存者がやってくる。
그리고 레지스탕스 결성부터 5년의 세월이 흐른다. 레지스탕스 기지에 그녀가 ——새로운 생존자가 찾아온다.
The battle was in its fifth year when a new survivor was welcomed into the base.
Then five years pass since the formation of the Resistance. She - a new survivor - arrives at the Resistance base.
msg
On the night of her arrival, the survivor joins the battle to keep the defense line aboveground intact and protects several injured members, saving their lives.
这名幸存者在到来的第一天夜晚便参与了守卫地表防线的战斗，并保护了众多伤员让她们得以生存。
記憶を失くした彼女は翻弄されながらも基地の防衛戦に加わり、素晴らしい功績は上げる。結果、多数の負傷者を絶命の淵から助け出すことに成功した。
기억을 잃은 그녀는 혼란스러워하면서도 기지 방어전에 참전하여, 뛰어난 전공을 세운다. 결과적으로 다수의 부상자들을 죽음의 문턱에서 구해내는 데 성공했다.
This survivor was involved in the battle to hold the surface defenses on the first night of his arrival and protected the many wounded to keep them alive.
She was at the mercy of her lost memory, but she joined the defense of the base and achieved great feats. As a result, she succeeded in rescuing many wounded people from the brink of death.
msg
The survivor then undergoes the instructions and training of Seele Vollerei, base personnel, and joins the base maintenance and machinery part recycling crew.
之后，该幸存者接受了基地成员希儿的指导与培训，加入到基地的维持工作与零件的回收工作中。
その後、彼女はレジスタンスの一員であるゼーレ指導の下、様々な訓練を受けることとなる。
이후 그녀는 레지스탕스의 일원인 제레의 지도 아래 다양한 훈련을 받게 된다.
The survivor was then mentored and trained by Seele, a member of the base, and joined in the maintenance of the base and the recycling of parts.
She then undergoes various training under the guidance of Seele, a member of the resistance.
msg
When dealing with engineers who abandoned the cause, she uses her calm judgment to keep the losses to a minimum.
在面对脱离队伍的工程班成员时，她做出了冷静的判断，得以将损失控制在能够接受的范围之内。
ある日、彼女の運命を大きく変える依頼が舞い込んだ。トンネル内の異音調査から一転した状況で、彼女は自らの命を顧みず、基地のメンバーを助ける選択をする。
어느 날, 그녀의 운명을 크게 바꿀 의뢰가 들어왔다. 터널 내의 이상 소음 조사에서 급변한 상황 속에서, 그녀는 자신의 목숨을 돌보지 않은 채 기지 멤버들을 구하는 선택을 한다.
When confronted with members of the engineering class who broke away from the team, she made a calm judgment call and was able to keep the damage to an acceptable level.

One day, she receives a request that changes her fate forever. In a situation that takes a turn from investigating strange noises in the tunnel, she makes a choice to save the members of the base, without regard for her own life.
msg
After that, she has become fully integrated into "Moth into Flame" as an official member.
至此，该幸存者也融入了“逐火之蛾”，正式成为了其中一员。
こうして彼女は認められることになる。この日を境に彼女は「火を追う蛾」の正式な一員となった。
이렇게 그녀는 인정받게 된다. 이날을 기점으로 그녀는 「불을 좇는 나방」의 정식 일원이 되었다.
The survivor is now officially a member of Moth by Fire.
Thus, she would be recognized. After this day, she became an official member of the "Moths Chasing Fire".
msg
While the investigation squad Grey Moth is on their way back to the base, they see a new type of Houkai Beast for the first time.
在对外调查部队灰蛾回归的作战中，疑似新生种的崩坏生物首次出现。
日々の依頼をこなす中、無量塔姫子率いる灰蛾部隊が大量の崩壊生物を引き連れ帰還する。その中に新種の崩壊生物がいたことで、事態は一変することとなった。
일상적인 의뢰를 수행하던 중, 무라타히메코가 이끄는 회아 부대가 다량의 붕괴 생물을 끌고 귀환한다. 그 중 신종 붕괴 생물이 있었던 것으로 인해 사태는 일변하게 되었다.
The suspected newborn species of Honkai creatures first appeared during the combat of the returning Gray Moths of the Foreign Investigative Forces.

While fulfilling daily requests, an ash moth unit led by Murata Himeko returns with a large number of Honkai organisms. The situation changed drastically when a new species of Honkai was found among them.
msg
To bring some of these beasts back to the base for research purposes, Bronya leads the fighters to HOMU Paradise in Nagazora, so that they may investigate and even capture a specimen to study.
为了研究这种新生种，布洛妮娅带领作战人员前往了长空市吼姆乐园调查取样。
新種が現れたことにより、火を追う蛾のリーダを務めるブローニャは危機感を覚える。そして、共に長空市のホム楽園へと調査へ向かうこととなった。
신종이 나타남에 따라, 불을 좇는 나방의 리더를 맡고 있는 브로냐는 위기감을 느끼게 된다. 그리고 함께 장공시의 홈 낙원으로 조사를 향하게 되었다.
In order to study this newborn species, Bronya led the combatants to investigate and take samples from Howlmoor Paradise in Long Hollow City.
The emergence of the new species causes Bronya, the leader of the fire-chasing moths, to feel a sense of urgency. Together, they head to the Homu Paradise in Changkuu City to investigate.
msg
In the depths of a castle, the squad not only discovers the "Queen" who commands the new type of beasts, but also finds traces of Herrscher Raiden Mei.
在城堡的深处，小队不但发现了指挥新生种崩坏生物的“虫后”，还发现了律者雷电芽衣的踪迹。
ホム楽園のお城を調査するブローニャたち。そこに待ち受けていたのは、新種の崩壊生物を統率する「クイーンビー」だった。しかし、脅威はそれだけに留まらなかった——そこには律者・雷電芽衣までいたのだ。
홈 라이프의 성을 조사하는 브로냐 일행. 그곳에서 기다리고 있던 것은 신종 붕괴 생물을 통솔하는 「퀸 비」였다. 하지만 위협은 그뿐만이 아니었다——그곳에는 율자・라이덴메이까지 있었던 것이다.
In the depths of the castle, the team discovers not only the Bug Queen, who commands the new breed of Honkai creatures, but also Herrscher Raiden Mei.

Bronya and her team investigate the castle in Homme Paradise. Waiting for them there was the "Queen Bee," the leader of a new species of Honkai creatures. But the threat did not stop there - Herrscher, Mei Raiden, was also there.
msg
To further track down Raiden Mei, Bronya and the Grey Moth squad leader decide to head to Massive Electric Corp, where all the clues point to, to investigate.
为了调查雷电芽衣的相关行踪，布洛妮娅与“灰蛾”部队首领决定前往与其的相关ME社进行探查。
雷電芽衣の行方を追うブローニャと姫子は、レジスタンスメンバーには秘密裏に芽衣と関係の深いME社へと調査に乗り出す。
라이덴메이의 행방을 쫓는 브로냐와 히메코는 레지스탕스 멤버에게는 비밀리에 메이와 관계가 깊은 ME사로 조사에 나선다.
In order to investigate Raiden Mei's whereabouts, Bronya and the leader of the "Gray Moth" unit decide to go to the ME. Corporation they are associated with.
Bronya and Himeko, in pursuit of the whereabouts of Raiden Mei, set out to investigate M.E. Corporation, which has close ties to Mei, in secret from the resistance members.
msg
Meanwhile, Moth into Flame's commanding office has also received reports that Houkai Beasts are rallying at ME Corp. The attack on Massive Electric will soon begin...
此时，逐火之蛾指挥室也收到了崩坏生物向ME社聚集的通报。ME社的攻略作战即将开始……
時を同じくして、レジスタンス指令室へ崩壊生物がME社に集まりつつある報告が届く。果たして、ME社で何が起ころうとしているのか。まもなくME社攻略作戦が始まる……。
때를 같이하여 레지스탕스 지령실에 붕괴 생물이 ME사에 집결하고 있다는 보고가 들어온다. 과연 ME사에서 무슨 일이 벌어지려는 것일까. 곧 ME사 공략 작전이 시작된다…….

At this time, the Moth by Fire command room has also received a notification that Honkai creatures are gathering toward the M.E. Corporation.The M.E. Corporation's Raider Campaign is about to begin......

At the same time, a report arrives at the resistance headquarters that Honkai organisms are gathering at M.E. Corporation. What is really going to happen at M.E. Corporation? Soon, the operation to capture M.E. Corporation will begin. ......
996: The third weapon is used to control enemies and attack from a safe place, maybe it's useful to this enemy
第三把武器适合控制敌人，并在安全位置进行攻击，或许对这个怪物很有效
第3の武器が開放されたみたいだ。この武器は「重砲」だ。主に遠距離から攻撃ができるスーパーメタリックデンジャーウルトラスーパー——な武器だ。早速試すがいい。——なに？ダサい……だと？え？本当に？……しょぼん。
제3의 무기가 개방된 모양이군. 이 무기는 「중포」이다. 주로 원거리에서 공격할 수 있는 슈퍼 메탈릭 데인저 울트라 슈퍼 ——한 무기지. 어서 한번 써봐. ——뭐? 촌스럽다...고? 어? 진짜로?...... 쩝.
The third weapon is good for controlling enemies and attacking from a safe position, and might be effective against this monster

It looks like a third weapon has been opened up. This weapon is a "heavy artillery". It is a super metallic danger ultra-super weapon that can attack mainly from a long distance. Try it out. --What's that? What's that lame ......? What? Really? ...... sucks.
997: Second weapon is unlocked now, try it
第二把武器已经解开了，快试试
我の第2武器が開放された。構え方としては……こんな感じか。
나의 제2 무기가 개방됐다. 자세는... 이렇게 하는 건가.
The second weapon has been unlocked. Try it.
My second weapon has been released. The way to set it up is like this: ......
This weapon attack speed is high, but the range is short, it's useful at solo
这把武器攻速更快，但是范围很小，适合单个怪物
この武器は「匕首」(あいくち)二刀流の短剣になる。フハハハハ！いい武器ではないか！範囲が少し狭くなるが使いこなせれば強い武器となるぞ。
이 무기는 「비수」 쌍검류의 단검이 된다. 후하하하하! 좋은 무기 아닌가! 범위가 좀 좁아지지만 잘 다룬다면 강력한 무기가 될 거야.
This weapon has a faster attack rate, but has a small range for a single monster
This weapon will be a "dagger" (匕首) (aikuchi) two swords. Hahahahaha! It is a good weapon! The range is a bit limited, but if you can master it, it will be a powerful weapon.
999: 深紅の光が我を呼んでいる。異世界から我を見ている者よ、我と共に新たな物語を始めよう！
진홍빛 빛이 나를 부른다. 이세계에서 나를 바라보는 자여, 나와 함께 새로운 이야기를 시작하자!
A crimson light is calling me. Let me begin a new story with you, who are watching me from another world!
